name: Vein Hotel
description: "Vein Hotel" 3D horror game, let's feel the fear! Travelling is fun. One night, when I woke up, I found myself in a strange place, it was a very different hotel, and I began to explore where I was and escaped. Why I am here? It must has some reasons .
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i7-3930K /AMD Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
